column5: We're going to the Chapleau area soon. Does anyone know how the mosquitoes, black flies, mayflies, etc are at this time? We're going in any event, just want to be prepared for what's there.

we were in that area about two weeks ago. bugs were bad in camp and in the evening on the water. Black flies should be about gone by now and misquitos only come out at night so it shouldn't be too bad.
